page.title: 08Shopping in Colden Common
page.content: Almost all of the shops in the village are located in this block but their range of services is limited to a grocers/sub-postoffice,breadshop, newsagent and wool shop. In a sample survey,over 80% of the interviewees did their weekly shopping outside the village,the main centres used being Eastleigh,Winchester and Southampton. The same survey revealed that 75% of the sample thought that shopping facilities in the village could be improved with a butchers and a chemist being percieved as the greatest need.
